chess.core
Class PieceCounts

java.lang.Object
  chess.core.PieceCounts
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, java.io.Serializable
public class PieceCounts
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants, java.io.Serializable

PieceCounts is used by ChessGame. PieceCounts keeps track of the number of pieces: for each player and for each type of piece.

Author:
Arvydas Bancewicz
See Also:
